GapFillInput.Title: Present continuous for future arrangements
GapFillInput.Instruction: Put the verbs in brackets into the correct form: Present continuous or the Present simple. Type your answers in each gap.

Content.Question:
1. We're having (We / have) a party for my daughter's birthday next Saturday.
2. Where are you meeting (you / meet) Rita for lunch tomorrow?
3. How often do you go for (you / go for) a long walk?
4. Alan's looking for (Alan / look for) a new job at the moment.
5. Maria isn't coming (Maria / not / come) to the party tonight.
6. What does your brother want (your brother / want) to do after university?
7. I come (come) from Ukraine, from Kiev.
8. Oh no! It's raining (rain).
9. This weekend Greg and I are visiting (Greg and I / visit) some old friends.
10. Do you like (you / like) cats?
